mapper.update: update product pro, orderr ord set pstock = (select (pstock - #{ocount}) as total from product where pcode = #{oday}), ord.sdate = now(), ord.scount = #{ocount}, ord.osuju = '출고 확인', ord.sdel ='출고 중' where ord.ono = ${ono} and pcode= #{oday};
mapper.select: select sdate from orderr where ono = #{ono};
